column5: User should have valid login credentials
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter valid username and password
3. Click "Login"
column7: User should be logged in successfully

column5: User should have an invalid password
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter valid username and incorrect password
3. Click "Login"

1. Open VWO login page
2. Click "Login" without entering any credentials
column7: "Username and password required" error message should be displayed

column3: Verify login with only username entered
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter valid username but leave password blank
3. Click "Login"
column7: "Password required" error message should be displayed

column3: Verify login with only password entered
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Leave username blank and enter password
3. Click "Login"
column7: "Username required" error message should be displayed

column5: User enters username in different case
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter username in uppercase/lowercase
3. Enter correct password
4. Click "Login"
column7: Should display a case-sensitive error if applicable

column3: Verify login with special characters in username/password
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter username/password with special characters
3. Click "Login"

column3: Verify login with SQL Injection attempt
column5: User enters SQL query as input
column6:
1. Open VWO login page
2. Enter admin' -- or similar SQL injection attempt
3. Click "Login"
column7: System should not allow SQL injection

column3: Verify login with slow internet connection
column6:
1. Simulate slow network
2. Try logging in
column7: Login should handle slow connections properly

column5: User logs in from different browsers
column6:
1. Open VWO login page on Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari
2. Enter valid credentials and log in
column7: User should log in successfully on all supported browsers
